title: Listen Closely (feat. SAFE)
lyrics:
Listen, ya
I hope you listen closely
Girl, don't act like you still know me
Tellin' lies to all your friends
You know the truth is what you want me, want me

Are in me, you are in me, yeah

Yeah, yeah, yeah yeah yeah

Oh yeah, oh yeah

Ooh



I'm taking longer than ever 'cause I love writin' new stuff

Uncomplicated communication, just settin' me up

I'm up and comin', I'll never stop runnin', givin' it up

I fell in love with the plan, I'm never makin' it up

I got the second stage in money that I found in my bank stashed

I'm halfway from my heart racing the snapback

I already know, I'll take you where you wanna go

Just follow the noise and we can start up the show



Listen, ya

Oh

Listen, ya

Oh



You gon' hit me when I'm through the snow, the snow

Right now, right now

Where are you? Where are you?

You gon' hit me when I'm through the snow, the snow

Right now, right now

Where are you? Where are you?

Oh, oh



I hope you listen closely

Girl, don't act like you still know me

Tellin' lies to all your friends

You know the truth is what you want me, want me

Are in me, you are in me, yeah

Yeah, yeah, yeah yeah yeah



Listen, ya

Oh

Listen, ya

Oh



Oh yeah, oh yeah

Listen

I hope you listen closely

Girl, don't act like you still know me

Tellin' lies to all your friends

You know the truth is what you want me, want me

Are in me, you are in me, yeah

Yeah, yeah, yeah yeah yeah
